text: Colin Campbell (2 January 1918 – 18 October 2003) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * Category:1918 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Preston Football Club (VFA) players Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Colin Campbell (footballer, born 1918)
